revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [(Col.) 16* (169?)];;(Mesore 28?, continued);;Syrias, son of Aphrodisios [- (through) . . . (?) -] for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 9 drachmai 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 4 obols; [for naubion, 1 drachme; for supplements, 2 drachmai 3 obols]; for eparourion, 10 drachmai; for supplements, 5 obols; for kollybos, 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. [Total: 26 drachmai 1 obol].;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 4 1/2 obols; for supplements: 1/2 obol; for kollybos: [2 chalkoi. Total: 5 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi]. (In left margin:) 28 drachmai.);Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis and [Thakiaris], grandson of Petesouchos, [for ch(--): . . obols];Apion, son of Sabinus, Antinoite, (for land) formerly owned by Aline, [daughter of Sambas], with the (dues) on the account of Longinia Gemella, for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 12drachmai 3 obols; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 4 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 drachme [1 1/2 obols; for supplements, 3 drachmai 1 obol]; for eparourion, 8 drachmai 2 obols; for supplements, 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 3 obols. [Total: 28 drachmai 1 1/2 obols. ;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 2 drachmai 1 obol; for supplements: 1 1/2 obols; [for kollybos: 2 chalkoi. Total: 2 drachmai 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi].;And for Iulia Prisca, for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 5 drachmai; for olive (transportation), 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 3 obols; for supplements, [1] drachme [1 1/2 obols]; for eparourion, 3 drachmai 2 obols; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1 1/2 obols. [Total: 11 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi]. (In left margin: 40 drachmai 25 obols.);Total for the day: 168 drachmai 4 obols.;;On the 29th, similarly:;Abykis, son of Demas and Taonnophris, grandson of Abykis: [- - -];Pyros, son of Didymos and Thasos, grandson of Pyros: [- - -] (In left margin: Year 8, month of Hadrianos (?));Petaus, son of Esouris and Tkolla[. . .], grandson of Petheus: [- - -];Charmos, son of Heron and Apollonous, grandson of Horos: [- - -];Petesouchos, son of Heraklas and [Stiynchis], grandson of Heraklas, [for ch(--): - - -];Herieus the elder, son of Horos and Thaesis, grandson of Pnepheros, [for ch(--): - - -];Petaus, son of Herieus and Tremenesis, grandson of Petaus, [for ch(--): - - -];Keras, son of Sisois - (through) the son of Gan[. . .] - for apomoira, 4 drachmai 1 1/2 obols; for olive (transportation), 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 2 1/2 obols [2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 drachme 1/2 obol]; for eparourion, 2 drachmai 5 obols; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols; for kollybos, 1 obol. [Total: 9 drachmai 4 obols]. (In left margin: 8 drachmai 17 obols.);Herakles, son of Petheus [and Taseus], grandson of Onnophris, for guards: 1 drachme; (and) for guard towers: 3 drachmai. [Total: 4 drachmai];Sambas, son of Petheus and Segathis, grandson of Keras: [- - -];Horos, son of Anchorimphis and [Achillis], grandson of Horos: [- - -]

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC - Pearl OM, PMich IV/2, 358B, 2nd column, 1939
